title: Snack Akemi Big Tits Wet Love
overview: At dusk, Yoshii enters the "Snack Akemi" before it opens. Inside the bar, Sumire (Kirishima Sakura) is preparing to open. Three years ago, Sumire was making a living selling her body, but one night, when she tried to steal money from a customer while he was asleep, she was reprimanded and found herself crouching on the street with her face covered in blood. At that moment, Yoshii, who happened to be passing by, rescued her and took her to his wife, Akemi (Kuroki Ayumu), who was closing up the bar. After that, Sumire regained her senses while being watched over by the Yoshiis and their regular customers, but...
